title: Kandy to GotaGoGama – Military veteran on a journey in a wheelchair
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A retired and disabled Army soldier was seen traveling to GotaGoGama, Galle face from Kandy.
The retired soldier is taking initiative to continue this journey alone, on his wheelchair.
Speaking to News 1st, he stated that he will join the struggle underway at Galle Face in solidarity, and will continue until the demands of the people are fulfilled.
Kandy to GotaGoGama – Military veteran on a journey in a wheelchair
Rulers have not understood gravity of present crisis: Ravi Kumudesh
